sentences.sContent: There are 57 police officers who are still on the streets of Minneapolis tonight because this plan prevented the layoffs their department was about to make.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are 57 police officers who are still on the streets of Minneapolis tonight because this plan prevented the layoffs their department was about to make.
sentences.sCn: 今晚有57位警官仍在明尼阿波利斯的大街上执行公务，正是因为这项计划阻止了当地警局对他们的解雇。

sentences.sContent: The moisturizer/styling cream/foundation that served you so well in Miami is not going to cut it in Minneapolis.
sentences.sContent_eng: The moisturizer/styling cream/foundation that served you so well in Miami is not going to cut it in Minneapolis.
sentences.sCn: 在迈阿密适合你的保湿剂、各式乳霜和基础护肤品，不会在明尼阿波利斯就不适合你。
